name: Sticky Boxes
description:
You go to your work to move boxes like every day, but someone has glued them ??!

Use arrow keys to move and R to restart. 

This game was developed in 48hours for the GMTK Game Jam of 2021 with the theme "Joined Together". 

This was my first Game Jam and i hope you have as much fun as i had devoping the game!

Thank you very much to everyone who has helped me develop this game creating free/libre tools or assets:

The awesome Godot Engine devs: https://godotengine.org/
Kenney for the tileset pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sokoban

For music and sound effects:

Brandon Morris: https://opengameart.org/content/completion-sound

Scribe: https://opengameart.org/content/adventure-time

ViRiX: https://opengameart.org/content/busy-day-at-the-market

Brandon75689: https://opengameart.org/content/feel-good-island

Zander Noriega: https://opengameart.org/content/school-of-quirks

Every asset used is CC0 except School Of Quirks song (CC-BY 3.0)
